last_episode_to_air.name: Reincarnation
last_episode_to_air.overview: Vivid details and unshakeable confidence -- from a 5-year-old. A child psychiatrist studies cases of past-life memories, which occur around the world.

name: Surviving Death
overview: What happens after we die? This docuseries explores personal stories and research on near-death experiences, reincarnation and paranormal phenomena.

episodes.name: Near-Death Experiences
episodes.overview: A doctor is found lifeless after going over a waterfall. Now she and others share their near-death experiences. Does consciousness expand after death?

episodes.name: Mediums Part 1
episodes.overview: Poised between life and death, mediums promise a chance to commune with the departed. Can seekers cultivate that ability and find solace and healing?

episodes.name: Mediums Part 2
episodes.overview: A medium leads a s√©ance, deeply moving a student. Plaster casts of "spirit" hands -- physical manifestations of the dead -- are explored.

episodes.name: Signs from the Dead
episodes.overview: A bird, a dancing light or a caress: Signs and messages from the dead happen all the time, mediums say. So the grieving look for ways to communicate.

episodes.name: Seeing Dead People
episodes.overview: Can consciousness survive a body's demise? An investigator records eerie sounds at a historic spot, and a doctor discusses encounters with the dying.

episodes.name: Reincarnation
episodes.overview: Vivid details and unshakeable confidence -- from a 5-year-old. A child psychiatrist studies cases of past-life memories, which occur around the world.
